reviews.review: A huge movie with a huge story but Marvel and Disney pull it off again..... If you didn't see the other Marvel movies you will have a hard time following this.

Overall an incredible film. Gripping storyline and many surprising heartbreaking losses. I sat in shock for minutes after each punch to the face. Comedy was hilarious throughout the film. A must see for any fan of the franchise.

The best half-movie that Marvel has ever made. Mad Titan Thanos is on a mission to collect six powerful stones that control elements of the universe. His goal: to wipe out half of the universe in order to bring balance back. The other obstacle in his way: Earth's Mightiest Heroes and a ragtag bunch of space cowboys.

Overall  a good movie with some fantastic action and interesting emotional beats but the film is severely overstuffed. It should have  been a 2 part film because there are just two many great character  arcs to put into one movie. However, Thanos  was a great villain, imposing and scary  but also somewhat sympathetic and understandable.

Amazing. It’s fun, exciting, intense, nostalgic, and emotional. Plenty of action, humor (sometimes a bit too much though), and VERY impressive visuals. I’d say skip on the Real D 3D and see it in IMAX. The only thing needed to truly enjoy this movie for everything it offers is watching all the marvel films so far - for this movie, there is one that you don’t have to see beforehand ;) But wow, 10 years of building up, and this skyscraper stands tall! Hopefully the critics give it more credit because it definitely deserves to be in the 95%+ range. I read through the critic reviews on Flixster... wow. There are some VERY idiotic critics out there. Some reviews even gave me the impression that they didn’t even see the movie! 84% is very surprising, and definitely unbalanced compared to their reviews for other movies. So trust me, the fact that I want to see it again and want to have it on 4K to watch it at home right this second just shows how thrilling this was. Go watch it, and have fun!
Probably the best avengers to date. By far the best ending to any super hero movie.
There is no way that this can't be the biggest and best movie of all time!!!!!!!
They were right. It’s Biblical And Marvel shows what a dark universe looks like.
